creditline: The Katherine Kittredge McMillan Memorial Fund
description: Bidri ware, bronze with inlaid brass.
medium: Zinc alloy; cast, engraved, inlaid with brass
text: This ewer once contained water used for washing before and after meals.  Ewers of this shape, with a bulbous center, pedestal foot, tapering narrow neck, and long spout, have been depicted often in paintings from the time.
title: Ewer
